entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -17.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: La Grande Rivière Airport 6:00 PM EST Monday 26 December 2022
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -17.4°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.5 kPa rising
Visibility: 4.8 km
Humidity: 81 %
Wind Chill: -27
Dewpoint: -19.9°C
Wind: SW 21 km/h gust 32 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday night: A few flurries. Low minus 18.
entry.summary: Flurries. Local blowing snow this evening. Local amount 2 cm. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 18. Wind chill near minus 28. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Monday 26 December 2022
